greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Enumerates pairs consisting of a strongly connected labeled tournament and an arbitrary labeled tournament.
reference: Miklos Bona, editor, Handbook of Enumerative Combinatorics, CRC Press, 2015, page 428, see b_n.
link: V. A. Liskovets, Some easily derivable sequences, J. Integer Sequences, 3 (2000), #00.2.2.
program: (PARI) seq(n)={my(v=vector(n)); v[1]=1; for(n=2, #v, v[n]=2^(n*(n-1))-sum(j=1, n-1, binomial(n, j)*2^((n-1)*(n-j))*v[j])); v} \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Sep 09 2018
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 24 2000
